details: Changing of language has been reworked
Division fields have been added to the filter and task characteristics. The task's division is taken from the contest (if not specified, it is marked with a '-')
Sorting by count of solves has been added
Ranks have been added to the filter and task characteristics. A taskâ€™s rank is determined by its rating:
Added the Contest date and Solved count fields in the problem table
Sorting on the contest/[id] page by default is now based on the Points field
The way information is entered into the field has been redesigned. Now the page will only refresh when the user has fully entered a number and pressed Enter or when they are outside the field
Calculation of the task complexity (adjusted once every half hour when updating data)
Localization for filters by points and rating (previously it was written sorting)
Detailed protocol of user submissions for a specific contest
Sorting the protocol table
Renamed the query parameter for filtering by type of participation (filterByParticipantType -> participantType)
The protocol data was grouped only by user name. Now the data is also divided by contests
The isOnly button on the task page filters tasks only by the tags that are selected and no others
Now only those tags are shown in the tag table that are in tasks with the minimum to maximum rating
Added timer on contest/[id] page, which displays how long it took to get the data
Unified work with URL query parameters throughout the application by refactoring components to use React hooks (useQueryState, useSearchParams) instead of a separate library of utilities
The build label has been removed from the field where the project version is displayed
Query parameters on contests, problems, users, and specific contest pages
A column in the contests table indicating whether information about official contest participants has been loaded
Code refactoring
Now the results of the contestants are uploaded instantly, if they were uploaded before and the contest has already ended
Rework protocol and contest submissions
Added protocol with time and contest filtering
The data is now updated once every 30 minutes
Added data localization
Added full application localization in Russian and English
Added selected language saving in cookies
Links unification (now they are the same as on etr)
Added task filtering by rating and points
All filters are now placed horizontally
Now the contest page displays its name and number
Fixed the issue with users not being displayed due to changed handles
Index filtering (if multiple indexes are selected, tasks with similar indexes will be displayed)
Task name search
Application versioning. Now the version and build are displayed at the top right, and versions are now update dates
Changed this updates table
Now the date is displayed in the format 'Month dd yyyy'
Task names were in English. Now most tasks have names in Russian
Task table
Task filtering by tags
Filtering by user participation type in attempts
Displayed data in user attempts
Contest/training filter
Data when displaying all user attempts was incorrect
About page, i.e., this page
Display of attempts in the contest table
Sidebar
The contests table now updates correctly when selecting a filter
Contest data requests
User table sorting
Incorrect style for contest table filter backgrounds
Display of icons in the side menu
Size and position of the side menu button
